full_description: Dash Technologies is an industry-leading software solutions provider as well as an IT training provider for over a decade now.Position: Strictly W2 OnlyResponsibilitiesUse a variety of programming languages in order to create user-friendly web pagesMaintain and improve the company websiteWork in a multidisciplinary team with other professionals such as back-end developers and web designersBuild high-quality mockups and design different prototypesProvide high-quality graphics and visual elementsOptimize our web applications for maximum speedDesign mobile-based featuresAlways stay consistent with our brand guidelinesGet feedback from users and customersMake suggestions for better solutions to problemsKeep abreast of the latest and emerging technologiesAttend training and educationsJob Types: Full-time, ContractSalary: $67,120.00 - $98,560.00 per yearSchedule:Monday to Friday
